'''1.5.2'''<ref>https://mcupdate.tumblr.com/post/49436600302/minecraft-152</ref> is a minor update for {{JE}}, released on May 2, 2013,<ref>{{tweet|jeb|329957969053749248}}</ref> to improve performance and fix some of the bugs and crashes in [[Java Edition 1.5|1.5]] and [[Java Edition 1.5.1|1.5.1]].

A [[Java Edition 1.5.2 (pre-release)|pre-release version of 1.5.2]] was released on April 25, 2013.<ref>{{cite|url=http://www.mojang.com/2013/04/1-5-2-pre-release-and-13w17a-snapshot-oh-my/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/http://www.mojang.com/2013/04/1-5-2-pre-release-and-13w17a-snapshot-oh-my/|title=1.5.2 pre-release and 13w17a snapshot – oh my!|author=Dinnerbone|website=Mojang.com|date=April 25, 2013}}</ref> This pre-release was later reuploaded, and this reupload became the full release of 1.5.2.

This is the last official ''Minecraft'' version that runs on PowerPC Mac computers and Java 5, and the last version to be playable without any login required.

== Additions ==
* Added banner that displays if [[Java Edition 1.6.1|1.6]] had been released.

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Enderman]]'''
* Now won't become hostile if they take environmental damage.

=== General ===
'''Performance'''
* Further performance improvements.
